sentences.en: A deficiency of vitamin K can lead to subcutaneous bleeding.
sentences.cn: 维生素K缺乏可能导致皮下出血.

sentences.en: A spreading inflammation of subcutaneous or connective tissue.
sentences.cn: 蜂窝织炎一种皮下组织或相连组织的扩散性发炎.

sentences.en: Anterior subcutaneous transposition is a good method for treating tardy ulnar palsy.
sentences.cn: 前方皮下移位术在治疗缓慢性尺神经麻痹是一种不错的方法.

sentences.en: Conclusion Subcutaneous injection of heparin can promote wound healing.
sentences.cn: 结论肝素皮下注射能加速创面愈合.

sentences.en: Disfiguring subcutaneous lesions bulge onto the surface and at intervals discharge pus.
sentences.cn: 皮下损害的形象是向表面凸起,并间断地分泌出脓液.

sentences.en: Incise the skin and subcutaneous fat, then palpate the lesion and excise the mass.
sentences.cn: 切开皮肤和皮下脂肪, 触及病变并切除肿块.

sentences.en: Infected mandibular, parotid and anterior cervical nodes usually cause subcutaneous induration and surface bulging.
sentences.cn: 感染的下颌, 耳下和颈前淋巴结,通常引起皮下硬结和表面突起.

sentences.en: Inflammatory cell infiltration can be spread to the subcutaneous adipose tissue.
sentences.cn: 炎细胞浸润可波及到皮下脂肪组织.

sentences.en: Methods: Using the excision of subcutaneous tissue to treat axillary osmidrosis.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用皮下组织切除治疗腋臭.

sentences.en: No subcutaneous crepitus is appreciated on examination of the skin.
sentences.cn: 在皮肤检查过程中未查及皮下捻发感.

sentences.en: Palpebral subcutaneous round mass with different sizes.
sentences.cn: 眼睑皮下圆形质块、大小不一.

sentences.en: The ecchymotic subcutaneous tissue has been removed.
sentences.cn: 切除了瘀血的皮下组织.

sentences.en: The incidence and size of subcutaneous hemorrhage were observed.
sentences.cn: 观察皮下出血发生率及出血程度.

sentences.en: The subcutaneous fat layer can warm.
sentences.cn: 皮下的脂肪层可以保暖.

sentences.en: What he is cutting through are subcutaneous fat and muscles.
sentences.cn: 他现在在切离皮下脂肪和肌肉组织.
